name: sparseSeparation
tagline: a toolbox to do sparse separation over the fourier-wavelet dictionary
body:
### Sparse Separation

A small Matlab Toolbox to implement sparse separation over the wavelet and Fourier dictionary using first order algorithms and pipelined operators. 

Download the code, read the readme, follow some of the examples, and enjoy!

Let me know if there are any problems.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
